title: looking for Trio Grotesk pairing
content:
Hi everyone, could someone be so kind as to suggest to me a companion and/or body text to go with Trio Grotesk?

[http://www.boldmonday.com/en/triogrotesk/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150417135433/http:/www.boldmonday.com/en/triogrotesk/ "http://www.boldmonday.com/en/triogrotesk/")

I'd like something contemporary to go along with it. I'm doing a site re-do for a friend who's got it and also has a subscription to Typekit, so if any suggestions would be on there, that would be fantastic, but it's by no means a requirement.

Thanks for any help or guidance you can give me.

Aaron
author: asjd
